quote: Everything changes in my life, and the world stays the same.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes

quote: life is a continous journey of transformation
author: Sukant Ratnakar,  Open the Windows

quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
author: Hugh Prather

quote: Life is about moving, it’s about change. And when things stop doing that they’re dead.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
author: Max Lucado

quote: I change the world, the world changes me.
author: Libba Bray

quote: Many people come to reinvention when life changes around them, but people come in all different stripes. I'm oriented to change.
author: Jane Pauley

quote: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: My father used to say that life is what you make it. Today is the first day of the rest of your life. You can’t change the past, but the future isn’t set in stone. You can effect a change there. Move forward not with hatred or love. Move forward with purpose. (Simone)
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Dream Chaser

quote: Things do not change; we change.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: Times change, as do our wills, What we are - is ever changing; All the world is made of change, And forever attaining new qualities.
author: Luís Vaz de Camões,  Sonetos de Camões

quote: I've come to believe that in everyone's life, there's one undeniable moment of change, a set of circumstances that suddenly alters everything.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven

quote: This is how the entire course of a life can be changed: by doing nothing.
author: Ian McEwan,  On Chesil Beach

quote: Some people try to change the world one life at a time. Others try to change the world one death at a time. And I try to change the world one bucket full of dirt at a time.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Life is about cherishing memories, getting lost in moments of beauty, and enjoying profound joy and happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: New day, new hopes, new life!!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
author: Louis Tomlinson

quote: Life will just not wait for us to live it:We are in it, now, and Now is the time to Live
author: Michelle Geaney

quote: Change is possible if you allow it to happen. Nothing in life is constant; it's always evolving and that's how life happens for me. Through my adversities I can reach new heights.
author: Chimnese Davids,  Muses of Wandering Passions

quote: I read a book one day and my whole life was changed.
author: Orhan Pamuk,  The New Life

quote: Life is problems. Living is solving problems.
author: Raymond E. Feist,  Silverthorn

quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: We are born and reborn again and again. We are changing with the waves of time.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All that you touchYou Change.All that you ChangeChanges you.The only lasting truthis Change.Godis Change.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: Each life experience poses this question: how do you want to be changed because of me?
author: Mollie Marti

quote: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
author: Mike Murdock

quote: You are born with the power to change your life by simply changing your thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.
author: Anatole France

quote: Your life experience is a moving picture, of which you are writer, director, performer, producer and critic.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Life stand still here.
author: Virginia Woolf,  Mrs. Dalloway

quote: Life is about becoming more of who you really are....
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped worrying about things you can’t control and started focusing on the things you can? Let today be the day…You free yourself from fruitless worry, seize the day and take effective action on things you can change.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Action and reaction, ebb and flow, trial and error, change - this is the rhythm of living. Out of our over-confidence, fear; out of our fear, clearer vision, fresh hope. And out of hope, progress.
author: Bruce Barton

quote: Life is three hours journey; childhood, adulthood & old-hood; filled with inspiration, perspiration and desperation.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Just knowing you exist changed the world for me.
author: Tiffanie DeBartolo,  God-Shaped Hole

quote: Love changes things; hope allows us to endure until the change arrives.
author: Iimani David

quote: That is life... to begin again when everything is lost!
author: A.J. Cronin

quote: Change your thoughts, change your world.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Life is a book waiting to happen.
author: Sloan McBride

quote: Live like there’s no tomorrow and learn as if your life depends on it
author: Omar Kiam

quote: Life is a gift, but living is a choice.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My Life is My Message
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Every life is different because you passed this way and touched history.
author: Barbara Kingsolver,  The Poisonwood Bible

quote: The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!
